activities: iMomentous is a Recruiting Technology company providing mobile and tablet career sites to large employers (our clients).   Personally identifiable information is collected when a jobseeker opts to apply for one of client's job positions.   The Personally Identifiable Information is name, email, address, phone number and work history.  The PII is  only shared with the specific Client for which the application was submitted.  The personally identifiable information is immediately transferred to our Client for which the application was submitted.  iMomentous will retain personal data we process on behalf of our Clients for as long as needed to provide services to our Client.  iMomentous will retain and use this personally identifiable information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
